overview:
LuisÂ´s professional experience has been in the fields of Customer Care, Customer Services, Customer Development, and more recently International Sales.

Thanks to all of these roles, he has developed a very good notion of the business.

Multitasking is not an issue for him, he has done various marketing related tasks and initiatives for the markets he was in charge of.

Having worked in various Multinational companies and in different Departments, thanks to his proficiency in English, Spanish and French, you know he will be able to communicate without any problems when ever it is needed.

His strong points would have to be his commitment and passion. He takes pride in being straight forward, spontaneous and very communicative.

He has great organizational skills and always looks forward for new challenges.
